msbt.message: Whoa! It's you! Sorry. Where are my manners, I had this dream that someone came to visit me, and they were the spittin' image of you. It's uncanny!Hmm, what came next Oh! I was surprised and said, "Whoa! It's you!" And then I told you about this dream.
Why, hello! Why don't you make yourself at home. Go on and take a look around if you like, .
Well, if it ain't another dreamer stopping by. Gotta say, I'm feelin' quite popular, !

Hard work won't guarantee your dreams will come true, but it'll sure improve the odds.And even if nothing comes of it, keep dreamin' those dreams, and you'll end up somewhere swell.Wow! I sure sound smart for a dream , ! Gahaha!

You ever tried cookin' in a dream? It's great! You can make absolutely anything with no effort whatsoever!Wanna make ? Easy. Homemade ? Even easier, kiddo!The only downside—and it's quite a big'un—is you can't eat any of it after you wake up, .
Why don't you put your feet up and sit a spell, kiddo?My place probably ain't the most interestin' around, but you're more than welcome here, .
